Articles.Content:
***KSP:***  ***1.0.2 OSX 64bit***

***Problem:***  ***Crash after any cpu remotely intensive action***

***Mods installed: Mechjab - Spacey-Lifters - Hotrockets - SmokeScreen - HRP - Firespitter - CollisionFX -*** ***Module Manager 2.6.3***

***Reproduction steps:***

***Build something a bit articulated, fire it, crash it, hit any button of the dialog popping after the crash... the game ends.***

**Log:**

[https://mega.co.nz/#!xcUnWTDI!VM-tOELqC7_nebnIByXsaQg1SmcbJbMMmxFOByRrEfA](https://mega.co.nz/#!xcUnWTDI!VM-tOELqC7_nebnIByXsaQg1SmcbJbMMmxFOByRrEfA)
